Direct Known Subclasses:
ChooseDirectoryWizardPanel, LicenseWizardPanel, NullWizardPanel, P01_Welcome, P02_Host, P03_CreateDB, P04_Initialize, P05_Publish, PX_Final, WelcomeWizardPanel
public abstract class WizardPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

The base class used for implementing a panel that is displayed in a Wizard.

Author:
Christopher Brind

Method Detail

display

public abstract void display()
Called when the panel is set.

hasNext

public abstract boolean hasNext()
Is there be a next panel?

Returns:
true if there is a panel to move to next

validateNext

public abstract boolean validateNext(java.util.List list)
Called to validate the panel before moving to next panel.

Parameters:
list - a List of error messages to be displayed.
Returns:
true if the panel is valid,

next

public abstract WizardPanel next()
Get the next panel to go to.

canFinish

public abstract boolean canFinish()
Can this panel finish the wizard?

Returns:
true if this panel can finish the wizard.

validateFinish

public abstract boolean validateFinish(java.util.List list)
Called to validate the panel before finishing the wizard. Should return false if canFinish returns false.

Parameters:
list - a List of error messages to be displayed.
Returns:
true if it is valid for this wizard to finish.

finish

public abstract void finish()
Handle finishing the wizard.

hasHelp

public boolean hasHelp()
Has this panel got help? Defaults to false, override to change.

Returns:
false if there is no help for this panel.

help

public void help()
Override this method to provide help.

getWizardContext

public final WizardContext getWizardContext()
Get the wizard context.

Returns:
a WizardContext object
